item.description:
Bill has graciously offered to host at his place in Arlington. He has a drum kit and piano (Yamaha p70), so no need for pianists or drummers to bring their own stuff (drummers, please do not bring your own kit b/c it can't be moved. I'm sure a couple of cymbals is fine though.)

Please note the new time and address. Since Bill plays drums, we won't need another drummer, but as always, I hope a bassist can come. Other drummers are of course welcome.

I am going to cap the RSVP list at 7, but if you play something small (like a horn), email Bill so see if he can accommodate you.
item.name: Jam at Bill's House
